Hey Alloran, I live in Central NJ. Do you know where East Brunswick is? I 
live like a minute from there, my sister words at what I call the NJ Twin 
towers by the Hilton Hotel, she saw the second plane smash into the building 
and both collapse from the top floor. THis really is depressing...

--part1_21.10fae398.28d00115_boundary
